climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Home Decor Idea: With beautiful printed pattern, this rug becomes a captivating centerpiece that elevates your home decor. Its intricate patterns and vibrant colors add a touch of elegance and sophistication to any room. Making it an ideal choice for various spaces, whether it be the living room, dining room, or other areas in your home.

Kid & Pet Friendly: The softness of the rug's fibers ensures a comfortable and gentle surface for both kids and pets to enjoy. It offers a cushioned layer that reduces the impact of falls, providing a safer environment for playtime. The plush texture also offers a cozy spot for kids to sit, lie down, or play with their toys, and for pets to curl up and rest.
Easy to Maintain: The rug is machine washable. Regular vacuuming helps remove dust, dirt, and pet hair, while occasional spot cleaning can address spills or accidents.

Protection for Hard Floors: If you have hardwood, tile, or laminate floors, the nonslip feature of this rug helps protect your flooring from scratches, scuffs, and other damage. The nonslip backing prevents the rug from shifting or sliding, minimizing the potential for friction between the rug and the floor surface.

Ideal Size: This rug offers 4 sizes to choose from, ensuring that you can find the perfect fit for any area in your home. Whether you need a small accent rug to add a touch of elegance to a cozy corner, or a large area rug to anchor and define your living space, there are multiple size options available to suit your specific needs and preferences.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super Soft, but Slippery. Hard to Vacuum w/Upright, but Fine w/Robotic Style Vacuum.
reviews.reviewText: For the most part I like this rug. I got the beige variety, but it's more like "greige", which is what I wanted. It has both grey and beige, which goes well in my bedroom.The carpet is lightweight and relatively easy to spread out. It takes a few days for all of the ripples to want to lay flat.The rug has a decently grippy backing to prevent it from sliding too much; however, I can't say the same about the actual walking surface of the rug. The carpet is extremely low-piled, but amazingly soft feeling. So soft; however, that it's actually a bit slippery. You heard me right, my feet can slide on the carpet, not to the extreme like hardwood or vinyl flooring, but still slippery nonetheless. This is one of the flaws with this rug. It's so soft & smooth that's it's actually a bit slippery.Another issue is, it's not easy to vacuum with my upright. I had to set my vacuum to the highest pile, even though this carpet has an extremely low pile. The rug wants to get sucked up into the vacuum when I run the upright vacuum over it. I guess because the carpet is more blanket-like, than rug-like. I suppose my round robotic (like a Roomba) vacuum will have to be used instead, since that vacuum seems to be fine on this rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Addition to My Space!
reviews.reviewText: I recently received the Large 8x10 Area Rug for my living room, and it has exceeded my expectations in every way. This rug is a fantastic addition to my space, bringing both comfort and style.The size is perfect for my living room, providing a cozy and inviting atmosphere. The softness underfoot is a delightful surprise – it feels luxurious and adds a touch of warmth to the entire room.What I appreciate most is the washable and stain-resistant features. As a pet owner, spills and accidents are inevitable, but this rug handles them with ease. The slip-resistant design is also a great safety feature, especially in high-traffic areas.
